front.title: Considering Generalized Multiprotocol Label Switching Traffic Engineering Attributes During Path Computation

abstract.t: This document provides guidelines for the consideration of Generalized Multiprotocol Label Switching (GMPLS) Traffic-Engineering (TE) attributes for computation of routes for Label Switched Paths (LSPs) in a GMPLS network. This document summarizes how GMPLS TE attributes on ingress links, transit links, and egress links may be treated as path computation constraints to determine the route of a GMPLS Label Switched Path (LSP).
